titleStmt.title: By the Quene. Forasmuch as diuers couetous people haue of late, vpon intent onlye to enryche them selues, and without any other cause reasonable, not only raysed vp the prices of all maner of grayne ...
Proclamations. 1562-03-10
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)

publicationStmt.publisher: In Powles Church yarde, by Rycharde Iugge and Iohn Cawood, Printers to the Quenes Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: At foot of sheet: Cum priuilegio Regiæ Maiestatis.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
